attributes.action: Better pay for all health and social care workers
attributes.additional_details: We can not take days off to strike, because we CARE. We need you to change the pay section to be the same and more equal. Everyone else can strike about pay but us, it's time to change that NOW!
attributes.background: We want better pay, the same as the NHS, we are one of the most hard workers yet we only get minimum wage. We work the same as NHS yet don't get recognised. WE WANT THE SAME RECOGNISATION AS NHS.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase NHS Staff pay by 10%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610647

Decisions about pay for social care workers are a matter for individual local authorities and social care businesses, not the UK Government or Parliament.
